synopsis.text:
Motoyasu Kitamura, Ren Amaki, Itsuki Kawasumi, and Naofumi Iwatani, four ordinary young men from Japan, are suddenly transported to a medieval fantasy world. Each one is given a legendary weapon and tasked with saving the kingdom of Melromarc from the destructive Waves of Catastrophe. Naofumi, an uncharismatic otaku, is given the Legendary Shield, making him the Shield Hero. However, his excitement for this new adventure quickly turns to betrayal and deceit. Framed for a crime he didn't commit, Naofumi is left penniless, friendless, and branded as the weakest and most despised of the heroes.

With only his shield and a burning desire for vengeance, Naofumi must navigate this new world filled with monsters and magic. He soon purchases Raphtalia, a demi-human slave, to aid him in his journey. Together, they must overcome the challenges of the Waves and clear Naofumi's name. Will Naofumi be able to rise above the hatred and mistrust and become the legendary Shield Hero he was destined to be? The epic tale of redemption and adventure begins.
